Romaine Salad with Orange and Olives


Ingredients
⅓ cup extra-virgin olive oil
¼ cup freshly squeezed orange juice
1 teaspoon white wine vinegar
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
2 heads romaine lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
1 bunch arugula
1 orange, peeled and segmented
½ cup pitted kalamata olives
½ small red onion, thinly sliced
2 tablespoons toasted pine nuts

Cooking Instructions

Whisk together olive oil, orange juice and vinegar in a
small bowl. Season with salt and pepper and set aside. Cut
orange sections in half and add to a large bowl along with
romaine lettuce, arugula, olives, and red onion. Toss until
well combined. Drizzle half the dressing over the salad and
toss to combine. Garnish with pine nuts. Serve the remaining
dressing on the side to be used at the table.
